alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 5:36AM CST until February 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Alabama...Tennessee... Shoal Creek Near Iron City affecting Lauderdale and Lawrence Counties. For the Shoal Creek...including Iron City...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Shoal Creek Near Iron City. * WHEN...From early this morning to just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 10.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1145 PM CST.
